body.p: I herewith sind you the permit of the County Judge of Campbell County for the Flag Spring home guards to obtain arms please attend to this as soon as convenant that the guards may be furnished with arms we are located on the Ohio River in the uper end of Campbell Co our location and Suroundin elements across the River render it important for us to be armed If it is in your power to furnish arms Send by the way of Covington & Lexing Lexington ^on^ Rail Road to Butler Station care of J M Jo Jolly Covington & Lexington Rail Road
if the arm can be furnished please notify J M Jolly Flagspring Ky

J M Jolly / Captain Guards
June 14t 1861
